name: M.X.S - Tiago Splitter - Sublime
additionalNotes: The M.X.S. by Dominique Wilkins features Dominican and Nicaraguan filler tobaccos and a Mexican San Andrés wrapper while the M.X.S. by Tiago Splitter features Peruvian and Nicaraguan filler tobaccos and an Ecuadorian Sumatra wrapper. These cigars are medium to full-bodied so they're not for the amateur smoker.
